name: hlhilsbase
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0

stmt.origin: hlhilslem(c0, cbs, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, nat1, w0)
stmt.pretty: hlhilslem(c0, cbs, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, nat1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cfv(cedring, c3), c5))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cfv(chlh, c3), c5))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c6))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c3, chlt), wcel(c5, c2)))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat4)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Base ` c1))
⊣ c2 =(LHyp ` c3)
⊣ c4 =((EDRing ` c3)` c5)
⊣ c6 =((HLHil ` c3)` c5)
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c6)
⊣ (w0 →(c3 ∈ HL ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]4
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c4)
